title: sArathiyAi
sahitya:
sArathiyAi varuvAyE kaNNA shamar tanilE ratham tanai naDattiDum


anupallavi

  pAradil vAzhkkaiyE pOradil aimporip-paghaivargaLai venrE vaghaiyuDan AlavE


caraNam    uLLamE kurukSEttiram unnaruLe astram Ongiya paghaivrai uravenru mayangAmal
vaLLalE venru nAn vAghai shUDavE eNNi vanduLLEn iranguvAivaramidu taruvAi
